I created a multitool to adjust the input/output behavior of my machines.
By §lright click§r (in the air) the modes can be switched, among:
In each mode you will see an overlay (colored border) on the faces of your machines if they support this mode.
By §lShift + right click§r you can configure the sides to be:
Inactive (no symbol), Input (green arrow), Output (red arrow), Input+Output (both)
You can only select modes and configurations that are relative to the target machine.
